channel.title: 1 problem
channel.description: I have 1 problem... i have my server source and client and everything and i started the source first and its up and running then i start the client it fully loads... then i log in and as soon as i moe it automatically logs me out.. and logs me right backin and then i try to move again and i get dced and then i log back in this happens over and over.... help anyone?

item.title: 1 problem
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Are you sure u using the right client?

Read full topic

item.title: 1 problem
item.dc:creator: @Thrasher_Alpha Thrasher Alpha
item.description:
@Thrasher_Alpha wrote:

monkeyboy2233:

I have 1 problem… i have my server source and client and everything and i started the source first and its up and running then i start the client it fully loads… then i log in and as soon as i moe it automatically logs me out… and logs me right backin and then i try to move again and i get dced and then i log back in this happens over and over… help anyone?

Its probably your location, or some code in the server. Move your location via character files, and check to see if there are any pop up codes.

Read full topic
